languages.text: {n}Наместник осторожно извлекает из кармана металлическую шкатулку — явно припасенную для такого случая — и осторожно вручает вам.{/n} "Это — подарок. Диковинка, конфискованная у контрабандистов. Надеюсь, вы сочтете ее любопытной".

traits.locale_text: {n}Наместник осторожно извлекает из кармана металлическую шкатулку — явно припасенную для такого случая — и осторожно вручает вам.{/n} "Это — подарок. Диковинка, конфискованная у контрабандистов. Надеюсь, вы сочтете ее любопытной".

languages.text: {n}He carefully pulls out a small metal box — clearly saved for an occasion exactly like this one — and just as carefully hands it to you.{/n} "This is my gift. A curio confiscated from smugglers. I hope you find it to your liking."
languages.original_text: {n}Наместник осторожно извлекает из кармана металлическую шкатулку — явно припасенную для такого случая — и осторожно вручает вам.{/n} "Это — подарок. Диковинка, конфискованная у контрабандистов. Надеюсь, вы сочтете ее любопытной".

traits.locale_text: {n}He carefully pulls out a small metal box — clearly saved for an occasion exactly like this one — and just as carefully hands it to you.{/n} "This is my gift. A curio confiscated from smugglers. I hope you find it to your liking."

{n}He carefully pulls out a small metal box — clearly saved for an occasion exactly like this one — and just as carefully hands it to you.{/n} "This is my gift. A curio confiscated from smugglers. I hope you find it to your liking."

languages.text: {n}ヴラダイムは小さな金属の箱をそっと取り出す。どうみても、今回のような場面に取っておいたものだ。同じように慎重にこちらへと手渡した。{/n}「これは私からの贈り物だ。密輸業者から押収した骨董品だよ。君のお眼鏡にかなうといいが」
languages.original_text: {n}He carefully pulls out a small metal box — clearly saved for an occasion exactly like this one — and just as carefully hands it to you.{/n} "This is my gift. A curio confiscated from smugglers. I hope you find it to your liking."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴラダイムは小さな金属の箱をそっと取り出す。どうみても、今回のような場面に取っておいたものだ。同じように慎重にこちらへと手渡した。{/n}「これは私からの贈り物だ。密輸業者から押収した骨董品だよ。君のお眼鏡にかなうといいが」

languages.text: {n}他小心翼翼地拿出一个小小的金属盒子，很显然，这个盒子就是为这样的场合准备的。随后，他以同样小心的动作将它递了你。{/n}“这是我的礼物，是从走私犯那里没收来的古玩，希望您会喜欢。”
languages.original_text: {n}He carefully pulls out a small metal box — clearly saved for an occasion exactly like this one — and just as carefully hands it to you.{/n} "This is my gift. A curio confiscated from smugglers. I hope you find it to your liking."

traits.locale_text: {n}他小心翼翼地拿出一个小小的金属盒子，很显然，这个盒子就是为这样的场合准备的。随后，他以同样小心的动作将它递了你。{/n}“这是我的礼物，是从走私犯那里没收来的古玩，希望您会喜欢。”

languages.text: {n}Saca con cuidado una cajita de metal, guardada para una ocasión como esta, y te la entrega con el mismo cuidado.{/n} «Se lo regalo. Esta pieza se la confisqué a unos contrabandistas. Espero que sea de su agrado».
languages.original_text: {n}He carefully pulls out a small metal box — clearly saved for an occasion exactly like this one — and just as carefully hands it to you.{/n} "This is my gift. A curio confiscated from smugglers. I hope you find it to your liking."

traits.locale_text: {n}Saca con cuidado una cajita de metal, guardada para una ocasión como esta, y te la entrega con el mismo cuidado.{/n} «Se lo regalo. Esta pieza se la confisqué a unos contrabandistas. Espero que sea de su agrado».

languages.text: {n}Avec délicatesse, il sort une petite boîte en métal qu'il gardait de toute évidence pour une occasion comme celle-ci et vous la tend avec la plus grande précaution.{/n} « Voici mon cadeau, une curiosité confisquée à des contrebandiers. J'espère qu'elle vous plaira. »
languages.original_text: {n}He carefully pulls out a small metal box — clearly saved for an occasion exactly like this one — and just as carefully hands it to you.{/n} "This is my gift. A curio confiscated from smugglers. I hope you find it to your liking."

traits.locale_text: {n}Avec délicatesse, il sort une petite boîte en métal qu'il gardait de toute évidence pour une occasion comme celle-ci et vous la tend avec la plus grande précaution.{/n} « Voici mon cadeau, une curiosité confisquée à des contrebandiers. J'espère qu'elle vous plaira. »

languages.text: {n}Er holt vorsichtig ein kleines Metallkästchen hervor – offensichtlich vorgehalten für eine Situation genau wie diese – und überreicht sie dir ebenso vorsichtig.{/n} "Das ist mein Geschenk. Eine von Schmugglern konfiszierte Kuriosität. Ich hoffe, sie gefällt Euch."
languages.original_text: {n}He carefully pulls out a small metal box — clearly saved for an occasion exactly like this one — and just as carefully hands it to you.{/n} "This is my gift. A curio confiscated from smugglers. I hope you find it to your liking."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er holt vorsichtig ein kleines Metallkästchen hervor – offensichtlich vorgehalten für eine Situation genau wie diese – und überreicht sie dir ebenso vorsichtig.{/n} "Das ist mein Geschenk. Eine von Schmugglern konfiszierte Kuriosität. Ich hoffe, sie gefällt Euch."

languages.text: {n}Tam da böyle bir durum için saklandığı belli olan küçük bir metal kutuyu dikkatlice çıkarıp aynı dikkatle sana uzatıyor.{/n} "Buyurun, hediyem. Kaçakçıların elinden kurtarılan bir antika. Umarım beğenirsiniz."
languages.original_text: {n}He carefully pulls out a small metal box — clearly saved for an occasion exactly like this one — and just as carefully hands it to you.{/n} "This is my gift. A curio confiscated from smugglers. I hope you find it to your liking."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tam da böyle bir durum için saklandığı belli olan küçük bir metal kutuyu dikkatlice çıkarıp aynı dikkatle sana uzatıyor.{/n} "Buyurun, hediyem, kaçakçılardan zapt edilen bir antika. Umarım beğenirsiniz."
